string_table.str: Vaughan's ODST troops are armed with EMP ordnance to neutralize Sentinels.
Disable the cloaking field to expose the Banished operation site.
They're using Engineers to hack into the Ark's local systems to prep the ship for launch.
Spirit of Fire scans show there's a terminal near the ship itself. I've got a decryption package, I'll do what I can.
When Isabel and Jerome destroyed the Enduring Conviction, the Banished became as stranded as we were.
And now they've found a way to break the stalemate.
If we find those systems, can you stop those Engineers, Quinn?
Ok, that'll be our back-up plan. We'll try a Condor assault first.
I'm leaving some troops to guard the gate; Now, let's move out. We can't have much time left.
Pelican Transport can be used to quickly move your army around the battlefield.
Stop the Forerunner ship from launching.
